title: CNN Signals Layoffs and Budget Cuts Before End of the Year
description: “These changes will not be easy, because it will affect people, budgets and projects,” Chris Licht, the head of CNN, told staff members.
dc:creator: Benjamin Mullin
media:credit: Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Warner Bros. Discovery
media:description: Chris Licht, the chairman and chief executive of CNN, said in a memo on Wednesday that the company would be evaluating spending.
